name: BlueOnyx

matches.version: document.write\("\nThank you for using the BlueOnyx ([^\s]+) Series.\n"\);

matches.text: <BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" onLoad="focuslogin()" onResize="if(navigator.appName == 'Netscape') location.reload()" LINK="#FFFFFF" VLINK="#FFFFFF">
<META NAME="Copyright" VALUE="Copyright (C) 2000, Cobalt Networks, Inc.  All rights reserved.">

matches.regexp:
(?-mix:

Welcome to the Web Site of [^\s^<]+<\/B><\/FONT>)

dorks: "Welcome to the Web Site of" "Use your favorite FTP application to move your website to the web server."
